item.title: Addison Barger CRUSHES A GRAND SLAM to put Blue Jays up 9-2 over Dodgers in Game 1 of World Series
item.description: Addison Barger crushed a grand slam that gave the Toronto Blue Jays a 9-2 lead over the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 1 of the World Series.

item.title: Blue Jays' Daulton Varsho crushes a two-run homer to tie game at 2-2 against Dodgers
item.description: Toronto Blue Jaysâ€™ Daulton Varsho crushed a two-run homer that tied the game against the Los Angeles Dodgers

item.title: NBA Commissioner 'Deeply Disturbed' By Gambling Arrests of Billups, Rozier
item.description: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver has expressed shock over the arrests of Chauncey Billups and Terry Rozier on gambling-related charges.

item.title: NFL Reminds Players of League Gambling Policy In Light of Federal Indictments
item.description: The NFL is reminding its players of the league's gambling policy in wake of the bombshell NBA betting investigation.

item.title: Will Smith drives in run, extending Dodgers' lead over Blue Jays
item.description: Will Smith drove in run, extending the Los Angeles Dodgers' lead over the Toronto Blue Jays.
